data.actual_result: After you send the message, the user mention menu appears magically again
data.expected_result: You send the message and no menu pops up
data.short_description: User mention + Custom emote displays the user mention context menu after sending message
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a new message and add a user mention ( eg @_dinos#0649 ) - Add an external emote by typing its :name: ( eg :bInzyRateLimit: ) - Send the message
